nodes.title:
1. Stocks: all-time high
2. Home prices: all-time high
3. Crypto (Bitcoin/Ethereum): all-time highs
4. Inflation expectations: highest since 2008
5. Fed: we need 0% rates through at least the end of 2023 & trillions more in bond buying to boost asset prices & increase inflation.
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: Hi Product Hunt! I'm Dmitriy, the maker of Noizer. I would love to introduce you to my small project - Noizer. An app, where you can listen to ambient sounds. It's inspired by Noisli project, but 100% free.
nodes.title: Noizer - Ambient sounds like Noisli, but free
nodes.author: Dmitriy Malakhov

nodes.excerpt: not less but better is the digital wellbeing app that helps you become resilient to digital distraction. Learn healthy phone use with 5 minutes of practice a day and feel in control again. Developed by psychologists, backed by science, and proven to work.
nodes.title: not less but better - Build healthy phone habits with 5 minutes a day ğŸ˜Œ

nodes.author: Francesco Di Lorenzo

nodes.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
nodes.title: Salut - The creator platform for fitness
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: Stack is an experimental product from Google's internal incubator Area 120 which makes it easy to scan and organize your documents. It uses Google Cloud's Document AI to understand the meaning of the documents you scan, or upload from your camera roll.
nodes.title: Stack by Area 120 at Google - All your documents, organized with Google's document AI
nodes.author: Gabor Cselle

nodes.excerpt: Thunder Client is Rest API Client Extension for Visual Studio Code, with simple and clean design. The extension makes api testing very easy with Scriptless GUI based testing.
nodes.title: Thunder Client - Rest API client for VS Code, lightweight Postman alternative

nodes.excerpt: Watch, share, and record video messages on the go with Loom for Android.
nodes.title: Loom for Android - Mobile screen recordings with a cam bubble
nodes.author: Nicolette Yadegar

nodes.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
nodes.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes
nodes.author: Brandon Foo
